Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Okanye naye uyothi, “Nkosi yethu angizange ngimdukise kepha wayesekudukeni okukude”
Uyothi, “musani ukuphikisana ngaphambili kwami kulapho sengasidlulisela kunina isexwayiso”
Ayiguqulwa inkulumo lapha kumina futhi mina angisiyena ongenabo ubulungiswa ezincekwini
Ngosuku khumbula lapho sithi esihogweni, “ngakube ugcwele yini na?” Siyothi (isihogo) “ngakube bakhona yini abanye)”
Futhi siyosondezwa isivande (kulabo) abagwema okubi hayi kude
Lokhu kuyilokhu enethenjiswa kona – kulowo nalowo ophendukela (kuMvelinqangi) ogcina isethembiso
Lowo omesabayo onomusa ngasese futhi ozoza nenhliziyo yokuzisola
Ngenani kusona ngokuthula lolu wusuku lwangunaphakade
Okwabo lapho phakathi yilokho abakufisayo futhi kuthina kunokungaphezulu
Futhi zingaki izizukulwane esazibhubhisa ngaphambilini kwabo zona zazinamandla amakhulu ngaphezulu kwabo futhi zazihamba emhlabeni ngakube ikhona yini indawo yokuphephela
Ngempela kulokho kunesikhumbuzo kunoma ngabe ngubani onenhliziyo noma onika ukuzwa kulapho yena engufakazi
Futhi ngempela sawadala amazulu nomhlaba nakho konke okuphakathi kwako kokubili ezinsukwini eziyisithupha futhi akuzange kusithinte ukukhathala
Ngakho-ke kubekezelele lokho abakushoyo futhi ugubhe indumiso yeNkosi yakho ngaphambili kokukhuphuka kwelanga nangaphambili kokushona (kwelanga)
Nasebusuku yidumise nangemumva kokuwa phansi niguqa
Futhi lalela ngosuku lapho ummemezi ememeza endaweni eseduze
Usuku lapho beyobe bezwa umsindo (ukukhaliswa kwecilongo) kweqiniso lolo kuyoba wusuku emathuneni
Ngempela thina siyaphilisa futhi siyabulala futhi kukuthina ukubuyela kokugcina
Usuku lapho umhlaba uyodabuka usuke kubona ngokushesha lokho kuqoqa kuthina kulula
Thina sikwazi kangcono lokho abakushoyo futhi wena awusiyena umphoqi kubona, ngakho-ke khumbuza ngeQur’an lowo owesaba ukusonga kwami
Ngifunga ngemimoya esakazayo
Ngifunga nangamafu athwele
Ngifunga nangemikhumbi ehamba kalula
Ngifunga nangababa udaba
Ngempela lokho enethenjiswa kona kuyiqiniso
Futhi ngempela ukwahlulelwa kuzokwenzeka
Ngifunga ngezulu eligcwele ubuhle
Ngempela nina nisenkulumweni ephikisanayo
Osusiwe kuyona yilowo ophambukisiwe
Ababhujiswe abaqamba amanga
Labo abangaphansi kwesembozo sokunganaki
Babuza ukuthi lunini usuku lokwahlulelwa
Usuku abayovivinywa ngalo emlilweni

Bekuthatha lokho abakunikwa yiNkosi yabo, ngempela bona ngaphambilini kwaloko babengabenzi bokuhle
Babelala kancane ebusuku
Futhi entathakusa bona becela intethelelo
Futhi	emnothweni	wabo	kunesabelo	sabacelayo nesabangavunyelwe
Futhi emhlabeni kunezimpawu kulabo abaqinisekile
Futhi nasemiphefumulweni yenu ngakube aniboni yini na
Futhi ezulwini kunesabelo senu kanye nalokho enethenjiswa kona
Ngakho-ke ngeNkosi yamazulu nomhlaba, ngempela kona kuyiqiniso njengoba nina nikhuluma
Ngakubeyafikayinikuwenaindabayezivakashiezihloniphekile zika-Abrahamu
Khumbula ngenkathi zifika kuyena zathi, “ukuthula” (u-Abrahamu) wathi, “ukuthula, niyibantu abangaziwa (kumina)”
Wayesephendukela emndenini wakhe wayeseletha inkonyane elinonile
Wayeselibeka eduzane nazo (izivakashi) wathi, “angeke yini nidle?”
Wayesengenwa ukuzesaba zathi, “ungesabi” zabe sezimnika izindaba ezimnandi ngendodana enolwazi
Ngakho-ke unkosikazi wakhe weza esho ngezwi elikhulu buhwaqabele ubuso bakhe washo, “(unkosikazi) omdala oyinyumba!”
Zathi, “isho kanjalo iNkosi yakho ngempela yona inobuhlakani ingeyaziyo”
